blogs.title: The Blog Renewal
blogs.preview: After the first iteration of my blog (which I built with Jekyll, as most github pages users do), I kind of didn't really touch it after writing a few blog posts. A part of the reason why was admittedly because I felt a bit lazy about writing new blog posts. I'm still working on that. But...

blogs.title: First Post
blogs.preview: This is my first post in this website! Go me!

blogs.title: A Short (?) Introduction to Matrix Transposition Algorithms
blogs.preview: Recently I had the chance to try using PCA for a data analysis project I was working on at Riderdash. Specifically, I was trying to convert a time-series data into a user-feature matrix of sorts so that I could analyze it with dimensionality reduction.

blogs.title: Why git blame is my new favorite git command
blogs.preview: Since June, I've been doing an internship at a place called [Riderdash](https://www.riderdash.com/). I've learned *quite* a lot of things in my stay here...

blogs.title: FibPseudoprime
blogs.preview: This is a review of the research project that I was a part of in late 2020 to spring 2021, under professor Ed Schaefer in Santa Clara University. I was working with Shaunak Mashalkar at the time.
